chunk: PCI DSS 4_0_1 Requirement Control 10.3.3 Defined Approach Requirements: Audit log files, including those for external- facing technologies, are promptly backed up to a secure, central, internal log server(s) or other media that is difficult to modify. Customized Approach Objective: Stored activity records are secured and preserved in a central location to prevent unauthorized modification. Testing Procedures: Testing Procedure 10.3.3: Examine backup configurations or log files to verify that current audit log files, including those for external-facing technologies, are promptly backed up to a secure, central, internal log server(s) or other media that is difficult to modify.
